docs.lead_paragraph: INTERNATIONAL A3-14 Russian Says Milosevic Is Ready to Deal with NATO The Foreign Minister of Russia, Igor Ivanov, said President Slobodan Milosevic of Yugoslavia was prepared to make concessions, but that NATO must also bend. A1
